question: Which state government has decided to legalize the cultivation of cannabis in the state for medical and industrial purpose?
explanation: The Madhya Pradesh government has decided to legalize the cultivation of cannabis in the state for medical and industrial purpose. Â It is clear that the farmers can only sell their produce to the government and not to private buyers. The government will allow the farming of hemp (a type of marijuana) for medical purposes like in the treatment of cancer. Hemp with a Tetra-Hydro-Cannabinol (THC) content of 0.3 to 1.5% can be used for industrial purposes like in the manufacturing of fiber.
